flowPara.flowSpan: information of subdetectors (CAD), pixel dimensions, etc.
Subdetectors in global coordinate system (measured during experiment).
Triplet-based Track finding, combination with MVD Hits for Track verification & improvement.
Combination of Track information of central and forward Tracking.

flowRoot.flowPara: Timestamp: Global SODA clock & individual local Detector-specific clock.

flowPara.flowSpan: Determination of particle type based on generation of Cherenkov Light or dE/dx measurement.
to event candidates. Combination of Tracks with common vertex.

flowRoot.flowPara: Subdetector Coordinates (Module; Full MVD; Full STT; ...)

flowPara.flowSpan: Combination of adjacent MVD pixel digis to one cluster; Computation of EMC Clusters and Bumps; Clusters in DIRC.
Plain straw Digis without any preprocessing.
of all subdetectors according to their timestamp.
all Hits in time window of 2000 ns from one Burst.
Energy Deposition, Cherenkov Light, Time Of Flight.
Hit clusters in EMC without Track info.
can be minv, pt, vertex quality, DOCA. Depending on channel.
Multiplicity; Sum of energy/momentum, max/min of energy/momentum; Thrust, sphericity.
List of Tracks and Neutrals consistent in t0.
